ETYMOLOGY: From Old English gēse or gīse, likely a compound of gēa ('yea') and sīe ('may it be').

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Used to give an affirmative reply or indicate agreement or consent.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 是的；对；表示肯定、赞同或确认的回答。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She asked if I was ready, and I replied, 'Yes.'
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她问我是否准备好了，我回答说：“是的。”

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: An affirmative answer, vote, or response; consent.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We need six more yeses to pass the resolution.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我们需要再有六张赞成票才能通过这项决议。

MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Used to express excitement, triumph, or great satisfaction.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 太棒了！好耶！（表示高兴、胜利或极度的满意。）
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Yes! I finally finished the whole assignment!
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 太棒了！我终于完成了所有的作业！
